title: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: When choosing to revert a file in the Java editor, it takes significantly longer compared to closing and reopening the file.
OB:
To observe this issue, perform the following steps:
1. Change the content of a file in the Java editor.
2. Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog.
3. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
4. Repeat steps 1 and 2.
5. Select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor.

Observed Behavior: It takes approximately 15 seconds for the contents of the window to be replaced with the original content.
